bio: Burly, finally given the promotion he so richly deserves. He's still a fired up guy who dashes out onto the front lines.

soultimate.name: Top-Secret Orders!
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases ally Attack by 15%, Defense by 105%, movement speed by 12% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: All nearby allies' stats are boosted for a time.

skill.effect: 3% Atk, 21% Def, 2.4% Spd and 6% MM boost for allies.
skill.name: The Bison

name: Bison Burly
